books.title: Memoirs of Arsène Lupin
books.author: Maurice Leblanc
books.summary: The gentleman-thief recounts the tale of his first major caper.

books.title: Ashenden
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A collection of short stories based on the experiences of an intelligence agent during World War I.

books.title: A Yankee in the Trenches
books.author: Robert Derby Holmes
books.summary: An American describes his experiences in the British Army in the First World War.

books.title: Tombstone
books.author: Walter Noble Burns
books.summary: An embellished retelling of the town of Tombstone, Arizona, during its heyday in the late 19th century, featuring famous heroes and outlaws of the American Old West.

books.title: Hindu Tales from the Sanskrit
books.author: S. M. Mitra
books.summary: Short stories and fables from the Sanskrit tradition.

books.title: Tartuffe
books.author: Molière
books.summary: A father announces his daughter will marry Tartuffe, a sanctimonious fraud and hypocrite.

books.title: Timon of Athens
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A wealthy Athenian lord becomes poor and friendless after his “friends” take advantage of his hospitality.

books.title: Vathek
books.author: William Beckford
books.summary: A powerful caliph embarks on a quest to harness the powers of darkness.

books.title: The Life and Adventures of Robinson Crusoe
books.author: Daniel Defoe
books.summary: Shipwrecked on a remote tropical island, a resourceful Englishman manages to survive alone for many years.

books.title: The Dark Other
books.author: Stanley G. Weinbaum
books.summary: A young woman seeks the reason behind her lover’s outbursts of cruelty.

books.title: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
books.author: T. E. Lawrence
books.summary: T. E. Lawrence’s memoir of leading the Arab revolt against the Ottoman empire during World War I.

books.title: The Box Office Murders
books.author: Freeman Wills Crofts
books.summary: The discovery of a drowned woman sets the police on the trail of a mysterious scam involving cinema cashiers.

books.title: Histories
books.author: Herodotus
books.summary: Herodotus recounts the history and geography of the ancient world.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Thomas Paine
books.summary: A collection of Thomas Paine’s essays on republicanism, the problems of monarchy, and human rights.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Thomas Gray
books.summary: A collection of poems by Thomas Gray.

books.title: Gulliver’s Travels
books.author: Jonathan Swift
books.summary: An Englishman travels to fictional islands where he meets tiny people, giants, magicians and talking horses.

books.title: The Night Land
books.author: William Hope Hodgson
books.summary: A 17th-century gentleman is reincarnated on a far-future Earth where the sun has died, and scours the hellish landscape for his lost love.

books.title: The Jungle Book
books.author: Rudyard Kipling
books.summary: Seven fable-like tales about jungle animals in India and the humans who live on the edges of their realm.

books.title: The Divine Comedy
books.author: Dante Alighieri
books.summary: Dante journeys through Hell, Purgatory, and Heaven in order to receive salvation and to find divine love.

books.title: Through the Brazilian Wilderness
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: Theodore Roosevelt’s autobiographical account of his expedition into the uncharted depths of the Brazilian rainforest.
